00070 INT8 OKToAttack(SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, int target)
00071 {
00072       // can't shoot yourself
00073       if (target == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00074             return(NOSHOOT_MYSELF);
00075 
00076       if (WaterTooDeepForAttacks(pSoldier->sGridNo))
00077             return(NOSHOOT_WATER);
00078 
00079       // make sure a weapon is in hand (FEB.8 ADDITION: tossable items are also OK)
00080       if (!WeaponInHand(pSoldier))
00081       {
00082             return(NOSHOOT_NOWEAPON);
00083       }
00084 
00085       // JUST PUT THIS IN ON JULY 13 TO TRY AND FIX OUT-OF-AMMO SITUATIONS
00086 
00087       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
00088       {
00089             if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].cannon )
00090             {
00091                   // look for another tank shell ELSEWHERE IN INVENTORY
00092                   if ( FindLaunchable( pSoldier, pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ) == NO_SLOT )
00093                   //if ( !ItemHasAttachments( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
00094                   {
00095                         return(NOSHOOT_NOLOAD);
00096                   }
00097             }
00098             else if (pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubGunShotsLeft == 0 /*SB*/ || !(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].ubGunState & GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER))       
00099             {
00100                   return(NOSHOOT_NOAMMO);
00101             }
00102       }
00103       else if (Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
00104       {
00105             if ( FindLaunchable( pSoldier, pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ) == NO_SLOT )
00106             //if ( !ItemHasAttachments( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
00107             {
00108                   return(NOSHOOT_NOLOAD);
00109             }
00110       }
00111 
00112       return(TRUE);
00113 }

00115 BOOLEAN ConsiderProne( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00116 {
00117       INT16       sOpponentGridNo;
00118       INT8        bOpponentLevel;
00119       INT32       iRange;
00120 
00121       if (pSoldier->bAIMorale >= MORALE_NORMAL)
00122       {
00123             return( FALSE );
00124       }
00125       // We don't want to go prone if there is a nearby enemy
00126       ClosestKnownOpponent( pSoldier, &sOpponentGridNo, &bOpponentLevel );
00127       iRange = GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sOpponentGridNo );
00128       if (iRange > 10)
00129       {
00130             return( TRUE );
00131       }
00132       else
00133       {
00134             return( FALSE );
00135       }
00136 }

00138 UINT8 StanceChange( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 ubAttackAPCost )
00139 {
00140       // consider crouching or going prone
00141 
00142       if (PTR_STANDING)
00143       {
00144             if (pSoldier->bActionPoints - ubAttackAPCost >= AP_CROUCH)
00145             {
00146                   if ( (pSoldier->bActionPoints - ubAttackAPCost >= AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE) && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) && ConsiderProne( pSoldier ) )
00147                   {
00148                         return( ANIM_PRONE );
00149                   }
00150                   else if ( IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH ) )
00151                   {
00152                         return( ANIM_CROUCH );
00153                   }     
00154             }
00155       }
00156       else if (PTR_CROUCHED)
00157       {
00158             if ( (pSoldier->bActionPoints - ubAttackAPCost >= AP_PRONE) && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) && ConsiderProne( pSoldier ) )
00159             {
00160                   return( ANIM_PRONE );
00161             }
00162       }
00163       return( 0 );
00164 }
00165 
00166 UINT8 ShootingStanceChange( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, ATTACKTYPE * pAttack, INT8 bDesiredDirection )
00167 {
00168       // Figure out the best stance for this attack
00169             
00170       // We don't want to go through a lot of complex calculations here,
00171       // just compare the chance of the bullet hitting if we are 
00172       // standing, crouched, or prone
00173       
00174       UINT16      usRealAnimState, usBestAnimState;
00175       INT8        bBestStanceDiff=-1;
00176       INT8        bLoop, bStanceNum, bStanceDiff, bAPsAfterAttack;
00177       UINT32      uiChanceOfDamage, uiBestChanceOfDamage, uiCurrChanceOfDamage;
00178       UINT32      uiStanceBonus, uiMinimumStanceBonusPerChange = 20 - 3 * pAttack->ubAimTime;
00179       INT32       iRange;
00180 
00181       bStanceNum = 0;
00182       uiCurrChanceOfDamage = 0;
00183 
00184       bAPsAfterAttack = pSoldier->bActionPoints - pAttack->ubAPCost - GetAPsToReadyWeapon( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00185       if (bAPsAfterAttack < AP_CROUCH)
00186       {
00187             return( 0 );
00188       }
00189       // Unfortunately, to get this to work, we have to fake the AI guy's
00190       // animation state so we get the right height values
00191       usRealAnimState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
00192       usBestAnimState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
00193       uiBestChanceOfDamage = 0;
00194       iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, pAttack->sTarget );
00195 
00196       switch( gAnimControl[usRealAnimState].ubEndHeight )
00197       {
00198             // set a stance number comparable with our loop variable so we can easily compute
00199             // stance differences and thus AP cost
00200             case ANIM_STAND:
00201                   bStanceNum = 0;
00202                   break;
00203             case ANIM_CROUCH:
00204                   bStanceNum = 1;
00205                   break;
00206             case ANIM_PRONE:
00207                   bStanceNum = 2;
00208                   break;
00209       }
00210       for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < 3; bLoop++)
00211       {
00212             bStanceDiff = abs( bLoop - bStanceNum );
00213             if (bStanceDiff == 2 && bAPsAfterAttack < AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE)
00214             {
00215                   // can't consider this!
00216                   continue;
00217             }
00218 
00219             switch( bLoop )
00220             {
00221                   case 0:
00222                         if ( !InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, bDesiredDirection, ANIM_STAND ) )
00223                         {
00224                               continue;
00225                         }
00226                         pSoldier->usAnimState = STANDING;
00227                         break;                  
00228                   case 1:
00229                         if ( !InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, bDesiredDirection, ANIM_CROUCH ) )
00230                         {
00231                               continue;
00232                         }
00233                         pSoldier->usAnimState = CROUCHING;
00234                         break;
00235                   default:
00236                         if ( !InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, bDesiredDirection, ANIM_PRONE ) )
00237                         {
00238                               continue;
00239                         }
00240                         pSoldier->usAnimState = PRONE;
00241                         break;
00242             }
00243 
00244             uiChanceOfDamage = SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( pSoldier, pAttack->sTarget, pSoldier->bTargetLevel, pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel, pAttack->ubOpponent ) * CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, pAttack->sTarget, pAttack->ubAimTime, AIM_SHOT_TORSO ) / 100;
00245             if (uiChanceOfDamage > 0)
00246             {
00247                   uiStanceBonus = 0;
00248                   // artificially augment "chance of damage" to reflect penalty to be shot at various stances
00249                   switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
00250                   {
00251                         case CROUCHING:                           
00252                               if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE + 10 * (AIM_PENALTY_TARGET_CROUCHED / 3))
00253                               {
00254                                     uiStanceBonus = AIM_BONUS_CROUCHING;
00255                               }
00256                               else if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE)
00257                               {
00258                                     // reduce chance to hit with distance to the prone/immersed target
00259                                     uiStanceBonus = 3 * ((iRange - POINT_BLANK_RANGE) / CELL_X_SIZE); // penalty -3%/tile
00260                               }
00261                               break;
00262                         case PRONE:
00263                               if (iRange <= MIN_PRONE_RANGE)
00264                               {
00265                                     // HATE being prone this close!
00266                                     uiChanceOfDamage = 0;
00267                               }
00268                               else //if (iRange > POINT_BLANK_RANGE)
00269                               {
00270                                     // reduce chance to hit with distance to the prone/immersed target
00271                                     uiStanceBonus = 3 * ((iRange - POINT_BLANK_RANGE) / CELL_X_SIZE); // penalty -3%/tile
00272                               }
00273                               break;
00274                         default:
00275                               break;
00276                   }
00277                   // reduce stance bonus according to how much we have to change stance to get there
00278                   //uiStanceBonus = uiStanceBonus * (4 - bStanceDiff) / 4;
00279                   uiChanceOfDamage += uiStanceBonus;
00280             }
00281 
00282             if (bStanceDiff == 0)
00283             {
00284                   uiCurrChanceOfDamage = uiChanceOfDamage;
00285             }
00286             if (uiChanceOfDamage > uiBestChanceOfDamage )
00287             {
00288                   uiBestChanceOfDamage = uiChanceOfDamage;
00289                   usBestAnimState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
00290                   bBestStanceDiff = bStanceDiff;
00291             }
00292       }
00293 
00294       pSoldier->usAnimState = usRealAnimState;
00295 
00296       // return 0 or the best height value to be at
00297       if (bBestStanceDiff == 0 || ((uiBestChanceOfDamage - uiCurrChanceOfDamage) / bBestStanceDiff) < uiMinimumStanceBonusPerChange)
00298       {
00299             // better off not changing our stance!
00300             return( 0 );
00301       }
00302       else
00303       {
00304             return( gAnimControl[ usBestAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
00305       }
00306 }

00308 
00309 UINT16 DetermineMovementMode( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bAction )
00310 {
00311       if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast )
00312       {
00313             return( RUNNING );
00314       }
00315       else if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
00316       {
00317             if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_GREEN)
00318             {
00319                   return( WALKING );
00320             }
00321             else
00322             {
00323                   return( RUNNING );
00324             }
00325       }
00326       else if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == COW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW)
00327       {
00328             return( WALKING );
00329       }
00330       else
00331       {
00332             if ( (pSoldier->fAIFlags & AI_CAUTIOUS) && (MovementMode[bAction][Urgency[pSoldier->bAlertStatus][pSoldier->bAIMorale]] == RUNNING) )
00333             {
00334                   return( WALKING );
00335             }
00336             else if ( bAction == AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE && pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && !IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
00337             {
00338                   return( WALKING );
00339             }
00340             else if ( (pSoldier->ubBodyType == HATKIDCIV || pSoldier->ubBodyType == KIDCIV) && (pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_GREEN) && Random( 10 ) == 0 )
00341             {
00342                   return( KID_SKIPPING );
00343             }
00344             else
00345             {
00346                   return( MovementMode[bAction][Urgency[pSoldier->bAlertStatus][pSoldier->bAIMorale]] );
00347             }
00348       }
00349 }

00351 void NewDest(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usGridNo)
00352 {
00353       // ATE: Setting sDestination? Tis does not make sense...
00354       //pSoldier->sDestination = usGridNo;
00355       BOOLEAN fSet = FALSE;
00356       
00357       if ( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAction == AI_ACTION_TAKE_COVER && (pSoldier->bOrders == DEFENSIVE || pSoldier->bOrders == CUNNINGSOLO || pSoldier->bOrders == CUNNINGAID ) && (SoldierDifficultyLevel( pSoldier ) >= 2) )
00358       {
00359             UINT16 usMovementMode;
00360 
00361             // getting real movement anim for someone who is going to take cover, not just considering
00362             usMovementMode = MovementMode[AI_ACTION_TAKE_COVER][Urgency[pSoldier->bAlertStatus][pSoldier->bAIMorale]];
00363             if ( usMovementMode != SWATTING )
00364             {
00365                   // really want to look at path, see how far we could get on path while swatting
00366                   if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, RecalculatePathCost( pSoldier, SWATTING ), 0, FALSE ) || (pSoldier->bLastAction == AI_ACTION_TAKE_COVER && pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == SWATTING ) )
00367                   {
00368                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = SWATTING;
00369                   }
00370                   else
00371                   {
00372                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = usMovementMode;
00373                   }
00374             }
00375             else
00376             {
00377                   pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = usMovementMode;
00378             }
00379             fSet = TRUE;
00380       }
00381       else
00382       {
00383             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_RED )
00384             {
00385                   switch( pSoldier->bAction )
00386                   {
00387                         
00388                         case AI_ACTION_MOVE_TO_CLIMB:
00389                         case AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY:
00390                               pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = DetermineMovementMode( pSoldier, pSoldier->bAction );
00391                               fSet = TRUE;
00392                               break;
00393                         default:
00394 /*                            if ( PreRandom( 5 - SoldierDifficultyLevel( pSoldier ) ) == 0 )   
00395                               {
00396                                     INT16 sClosestNoise = (INT16) MostImportantNoiseHeard( pSoldier, NULL, NULL, NULL );
00397                                     if ( sClosestNoise != NOWHERE && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sClosestNoise ) < MaxDistanceVisible() + 10 )
00398                                     {
00399                                           pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = SWATTING;
00400                                           fSet = TRUE;
00401                                     }
00402                               }*/
00403                               if ( !fSet )
00404                               {
00405                                     pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = DetermineMovementMode( pSoldier, pSoldier->bAction );
00406                                     fSet = TRUE;
00407                               }
00408                               break;
00409                   }
00410 
00411             }
00412             else
00413             {
00414                   pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = DetermineMovementMode( pSoldier, pSoldier->bAction );
00415                   fSet = TRUE;
00416             }
00417 
00418             if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == SWATTING && !IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
00419             {
00420                   pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;
00421             }
00422       }
00423 
00424       //EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
00425       // ATE: Using this more versitile version
00426       // Last paramater says whether to re-start the soldier's animation
00427       // This should be done if buddy was paused for fNoApstofinishMove...
00428       EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, usGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode , FALSE, pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove );
00429 
00430 }

00433 BOOLEAN IsActionAffordable(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00434 {
00435       INT8  bMinPointsNeeded = 0;
00436       INT8 bAPForStandUp = 0;
00437       INT8 bAPToLookAtWall = ( FindDirectionForClimbing( pSoldier->sGridNo ) == pSoldier->bDirection ) ? 0 : 1;
00438 
00439       //NumMessage("AffordableAction - Guy#",pSoldier->ubID);
00440 
00441       switch (pSoldier->bAction)
00442       {
00443             case AI_ACTION_NONE:                  // maintain current position & facing
00444                   // no cost for doing nothing!
00445                   break;
00446 
00447             case AI_ACTION_CHANGE_FACING:         // turn to face another direction
00448                   bMinPointsNeeded = (INT8) GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
00449                   break;
00450 
00451             case AI_ACTION_RANDOM_PATROL:         // move towards a particular location
00452             case AI_ACTION_SEEK_FRIEND:           // move towards friend in trouble
00453             case AI_ACTION_SEEK_OPPONENT:         // move towards a reported opponent
00454             case AI_ACTION_TAKE_COVER:            // run for nearest cover from threat
00455             case AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER:            // move closer to a strategic location
00456             case AI_ACTION_POINT_PATROL:          // move towards next patrol point
00457             case AI_ACTION_LEAVE_WATER_GAS:       // seek nearest spot of ungassed land
00458             case AI_ACTION_SEEK_NOISE:            // seek most important noise heard
00459             case AI_ACTION_ESCORTED_MOVE:         // go where told to by escortPlayer
00460             case AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY:              // run away from nearby opponent(s)
00461             case AI_ACTION_APPROACH_MERC:
00462             case AI_ACTION_TRACK:
00463             case AI_ACTION_EAT:
00464             case AI_ACTION_SCHEDULE_MOVE:
00465             case AI_ACTION_WALK:
00466             case AI_ACTION_MOVE_TO_CLIMB:
00467                   // for movement, must have enough APs to move at least 1 tile's worth
00468                   bMinPointsNeeded = MinPtsToMove(pSoldier);
00469                   break;
00470 
00471             case AI_ACTION_PICKUP_ITEM:           // grab things lying on the ground
00472                   bMinPointsNeeded = __max( MinPtsToMove( pSoldier ), AP_PICKUP_ITEM );
00473                   break;
00474 
00475             case AI_ACTION_OPEN_OR_CLOSE_DOOR:
00476             case AI_ACTION_UNLOCK_DOOR:
00477             case AI_ACTION_LOCK_DOOR:
00478                   bMinPointsNeeded = MinPtsToMove(pSoldier);
00479                   break;
00480       
00481             case AI_ACTION_DROP_ITEM:
00482                   bMinPointsNeeded = AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
00483                   break;
00484 
00485             case AI_ACTION_FIRE_GUN:              // shoot at nearby opponent
00486             case AI_ACTION_TOSS_PROJECTILE:       // throw grenade at/near opponent(s)
00487             case AI_ACTION_KNIFE_MOVE:            // preparing to stab adjacent opponent
00488             case AI_ACTION_THROW_KNIFE:
00489                   // only FIRE_GUN currently actually pays extra turning costs!
00490                   bMinPointsNeeded = MinAPsToAttack(pSoldier,pSoldier->usActionData,ADDTURNCOST);
00491 
00492 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00493                   if (ptsNeeded > pSoldier->bActionPoints)
00494                   {
00495                   /*
00496                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"AI ERROR: %s has insufficient points for attack action %d at grid %d",
00497                                           pSoldier->name,pSoldier->bAction,pSoldier->usActionData);
00498                         PopMessage(tempstr);
00499                         */
00500                   }
00501 #endif
00502                   break;
00503 
00504             case AI_ACTION_PULL_TRIGGER:          // activate an adjacent panic trigger
00505                   bMinPointsNeeded = AP_PULL_TRIGGER;
00506                   break;
00507 
00508             case AI_ACTION_USE_DETONATOR:         // grab detonator and set off bomb(s)
00509                   bMinPointsNeeded = AP_USE_REMOTE;
00510                   break;
00511 
00512             case AI_ACTION_YELLOW_ALERT:          // tell friends opponent(s) heard
00513             case AI_ACTION_RED_ALERT:             // tell friends opponent(s) seen
00514             case AI_ACTION_CREATURE_CALL:                    // for now
00515                   bMinPointsNeeded = AP_RADIO;
00516                   break;
00517 
00518             case AI_ACTION_CHANGE_STANCE:                // crouch
00519                   bMinPointsNeeded = AP_CROUCH;
00520                   break;
00521 
00522             case AI_ACTION_GIVE_AID:              // help injured/dying friend
00523                   bMinPointsNeeded = 0;
00524                   break;
00525 
00526             case AI_ACTION_CLIMB_ROOF:
00527                   if (pSoldier->bLevel == 0)
00528                   {
00529                         if( PTR_CROUCHED ) bAPForStandUp = 2;
00530                         if( PTR_PRONE ) bAPForStandUp = 4;
00531                         bMinPointsNeeded = AP_CLIMBROOF + bAPForStandUp + bAPToLookAtWall;
00532                   }
00533                   else 
00534                   {
00535                         if( !PTR_CROUCHED ) bAPForStandUp = 2;
00536                         bMinPointsNeeded = AP_CLIMBOFFROOF + bAPForStandUp + bAPToLookAtWall;
00537                   }
00538                   break;                  
00539 
00540             case AI_ACTION_COWER:
00541             case AI_ACTION_STOP_COWERING:
00542             case AI_ACTION_LOWER_GUN:
00543             case AI_ACTION_END_COWER_AND_MOVE:
00544             case AI_ACTION_TRAVERSE_DOWN:
00545             case AI_ACTION_OFFER_SURRENDER:
00546                   bMinPointsNeeded = 0;
00547                   break;
00548                   
00549             default:
00550 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00551                   //NumMessage("AffordableAction - Illegal action type = ",pSoldier->bAction);
00552 #endif
00553                   break;
00554       }
00555 
00556       // check whether or not we can afford to do this action
00557       if (bMinPointsNeeded > pSoldier->bActionPoints)
00558       {
00559             return(FALSE);
00560       }
00561       else
00562       {
00563             return(TRUE);
00564       }
00565 }
00566 
00567 INT16 RandomFriendWithin(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00568 {
00569       UINT32                        uiLoop;
00570       UINT16                        usMaxDist;
00571       UINT8                         ubFriendCount, ubFriendIDs[MAXMERCS], ubFriendID;
00572       UINT16                        usDirection;
00573       UINT8                         ubDirsLeft;
00574       BOOLEAN                       fDirChecked[8];
00575       BOOLEAN                       fRangeRestricted = FALSE, fFound = FALSE;
00576       UINT16                        usDest, usOrigin;
00577       SOLDIERTYPE *     pFriend;
00578 
00579 
00580       // obtain maximum roaming distance from soldier's origin
00581       usMaxDist = RoamingRange(pSoldier, (INT16 *)&usOrigin);
00582 
00583       // if our movement range is restricted
00584 
00585       // CJC: since RandomFriendWithin is only used in non-combat, ALWAYS restrict range.
00586       fRangeRestricted = TRUE;
00587       /*
00588       if (usMaxDist < MAX_ROAMING_RANGE)
00589       {
00590             fRangeRestricted = TRUE;
00591       }
00592       */
00593 
00594       // if range is restricted, make sure origin is a legal gridno!
00595       if (fRangeRestricted && ((usOrigin < 0) || (usOrigin >= GRIDSIZE)))
00596       {
00597 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00598             NameMessage(pSoldier,"has illegal origin, but his roaming range is restricted!",1000);
00599 #endif
00600             return(FALSE);
00601       }
00602 
00603       ubFriendCount = 0;
00604 
00605       // build a list of the guynums of all active, eligible friendly mercs
00606 
00607       // go through each soldier, looking for "friends" (soldiers on same side)
00608       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00609       {
00610             pFriend = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00611 
00612             // if this merc is inactive, not in sector, or dead
00613             if (!pFriend)
00614             {
00615                   continue;
00616             }
00617 
00618             // skip ourselves
00619             if (pFriend->ubID == pSoldier->ubID)
00620             {
00621                   continue;
00622             }
00623 
00624             // if this man not neutral, but is on my side, OR if he is neutral, but
00625             // so am I, then he's a "friend" for the purposes of random visitations
00626             if ((!pFriend->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide == pFriend->bSide)) ||
00627                   (pFriend->bNeutral && pSoldier->bNeutral))
00628             {
00629                   // if we're not already neighbors
00630                   if (SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pFriend->sGridNo) > 1)
00631                   {
00632        // remember his guynum, increment friend counter
00633                    ubFriendIDs[ubFriendCount++] = pFriend->ubID;
00634                   }
00635             }
00636       }
00637 
00638 
00639       while (ubFriendCount && !fFound)
00640       {
00641             // randomly select one of the remaining friends in the list
00642             ubFriendID = ubFriendIDs[PreRandom(ubFriendCount)];
00643 
00644             // if our movement range is NOT restricted, or this friend's within range
00645             // use distance - 1, because there must be at least 1 tile 1 space closer
00646             if (!fRangeRestricted ||
00647                   (SpacesAway(usOrigin,Menptr[ubFriendID].sGridNo) - 1) <= usMaxDist)
00648             {
00649                   // should be close enough, try to find a legal ->sDestination within 1 tile
00650 
00651                   // clear dirChecked flag for all 8 directions
00652                   for (usDirection = 0; usDirection < 8; usDirection++)
00653                   {
00654                         fDirChecked[usDirection] = FALSE;
00655                   }
00656 
00657                   ubDirsLeft = 8;
00658 
00659                   // examine all 8 spots around 'ubFriendID'
00660                   // keep looking while directions remain and a satisfactory one not found
00661                   while ((ubDirsLeft--) && !fFound)
00662                   {
00663                         // randomly select a direction which hasn't been 'checked' yet
00664                         do
00665                         {
00666                               usDirection = (UINT16) Random(8);
00667                         }
00668                         while (fDirChecked[usDirection]);
00669 
00670                         fDirChecked[usDirection] = TRUE;
00671 
00672                         // determine the gridno 1 tile away from current friend in this direction
00673                         usDest = NewGridNo(Menptr[ubFriendID].sGridNo,DirectionInc((INT16)(usDirection + 1)));
00674 
00675                         // if that's out of bounds, ignore it & check next direction
00676                         if (usDest == Menptr[ubFriendID].sGridNo)
00677                         {
00678                               continue;
00679                         }
00680 
00681                         // if our movement range is NOT restricted
00682                         if (!fRangeRestricted || (SpacesAway(usOrigin,usDest) <= usMaxDist))
00683                         {
00684                               if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,usDest,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER, 0))
00685                               {
00686                                     fFound = TRUE;            // found a spot
00687                                     pSoldier->usActionData = usDest;  // store this ->sDestination
00688                                     pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;  // optimization - Ian
00689                                     break;                   // stop checking in other directions
00690                               }
00691                         }
00692                   }
00693             }
00694 
00695             if (!fFound)
00696             {
00697                   ubFriendCount--;
00698 
00699                   // if we hadn't already picked the last friend currently in the list
00700                   if (ubFriendCount != ubFriendID)
00701                   {
00702                         ubFriendIDs[ubFriendID] = ubFriendIDs[ubFriendCount];
00703                   }
00704             }
00705       }
00706 
00707       return(fFound);
00708 }
00709 
00710 
00711 INT16 RandDestWithinRange(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00712 {
00713       INT16 sRandDest = NOWHERE;
00714       UINT16 usOrigin, usMaxDist;
00715       UINT8 ubTriesLeft;
00716       BOOLEAN fLimited = FALSE, fFound = FALSE;
00717       INT16 sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXRange, sYRange, sXOffset, sYOffset;
00718       INT16 sOrigX, sOrigY;
00719       INT16 sX, sY;
00720       UINT8 ubRoom = 0, ubTempRoom;
00721 
00722       sOrigX = sOrigY = -1;
00723       sMaxLeft = sMaxRight = sMaxUp = sMaxDown = sXRange = sYRange = -1;
00724 
00725       // Try to find a random ->sDestination that's no more than maxDist away from
00726       // the given gridno of origin
00727 
00728       if (gfTurnBasedAI)
00729       {
00730             ubTriesLeft = 10;
00731       }
00732       else
00733       {
00734             ubTriesLeft = 1;
00735       }
00736 
00737       usMaxDist = RoamingRange(pSoldier, (INT16 *)&usOrigin);
00738 
00739       if ( pSoldier->bOrders <= CLOSEPATROL && (pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM || pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) )
00740       {
00741             // any other combo uses the default of ubRoom == 0, set above
00742             if ( !InARoom( pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0], &ubRoom ) )
00743             {
00744                   ubRoom = 0;
00745             }
00746       }
00747 
00748       // if the maxDist is truly a restriction
00749       if (usMaxDist < (MAXCOL - 1))
00750       {
00751             fLimited = TRUE;
00752 
00753             // determine maximum horizontal limits
00754             sOrigX = usOrigin % MAXCOL;
00755             sOrigY = usOrigin / MAXCOL;
00756 
00757             sMaxLeft  = min(usMaxDist, sOrigX);
00758             sMaxRight = min(usMaxDist,MAXCOL - (sOrigX + 1));
00759 
00760             // determine maximum vertical limits
00761             sMaxUp   = min(usMaxDist, sOrigY);
00762             sMaxDown = min(usMaxDist,MAXROW - (sOrigY + 1));
00763 
00764             sXRange = sMaxLeft + sMaxRight + 1;
00765             sYRange = sMaxUp + sMaxDown + 1;
00766       }
00767 
00768       if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER)
00769       {
00770             // only crawl 1 tile, within our roaming range
00771             while ((ubTriesLeft--) && !fFound)
00772             {
00773                   sXOffset = (INT16) Random( 3 ) - 1; // generates -1 to +1
00774                   sYOffset = (INT16) Random( 3 ) - 1;
00775 
00776                   if (fLimited)
00777                   {
00778                         sX = pSoldier->sGridNo % MAXCOL + sXOffset;
00779                         sY = pSoldier->sGridNo / MAXCOL + sYOffset;
00780                         if (sX < sOrigX - sMaxLeft || sX > sOrigX + sMaxRight)
00781                         {
00782                               continue;
00783                         }
00784                         if (sY < sOrigY - sMaxUp || sY > sOrigY + sMaxDown)
00785                         {
00786                               continue;
00787                         }
00788                         sRandDest = usOrigin + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00789                   }
00790                   else
00791                   {
00792                         sRandDest = usOrigin + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00793                   }
00794 
00795                   if (!LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sRandDest,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER,0))
00796                   {
00797                         sRandDest = NOWHERE;
00798                         continue;                   // try again!
00799                   }
00800 
00801                   // passed all the tests, ->sDestination is acceptable
00802                   fFound = TRUE;
00803                   pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE; // optimization - Ian
00804             }
00805       }
00806       else
00807       {
00808             // keep rolling random ->sDestinations until one's satisfactory or retries used
00809             while ((ubTriesLeft--) && !fFound)
00810             {
00811                   if (fLimited)
00812                   {
00813                         sXOffset = ((INT16)Random(sXRange)) - sMaxLeft;
00814                         sYOffset = ((INT16)Random(sYRange)) - sMaxUp;
00815 
00816                         sRandDest = usOrigin + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00817 
00818       #ifdef BETAVERSION
00819                         if ((sRandDest < 0) || (sRandDest >= GRIDSIZE))
00820                         {
00821                               NumMessage("RandDestWithinRange: ERROR - Gridno out of range! = ",sRandDest);
00822                               sRandDest = random(GRIDSIZE);
00823                         }
00824       #endif
00825                   }
00826                   else
00827                   {
00828                         sRandDest = (INT16) PreRandom(GRIDSIZE);
00829                   }
00830 
00831                   if ( ubRoom && InARoom( sRandDest, &ubTempRoom ) && ubTempRoom != ubRoom )
00832                   {
00833                         // outside of room available for patrol!
00834                         sRandDest = NOWHERE;
00835                         continue;
00836                   }
00837 
00838                   if (!LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sRandDest,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER,0))
00839                   {
00840                         sRandDest = NOWHERE;
00841                         continue;                   // try again!
00842                   }
00843 
00844                   // passed all the tests, ->sDestination is acceptable
00845                   fFound = TRUE;
00846                   pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE; // optimization - Ian
00847             }
00848       }
00849 
00850       return(sRandDest); // defaults to NOWHERE
00851 }
00852 
00853 INT16 ClosestReachableDisturbance(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubUnconsciousOK, BOOLEAN * pfChangeLevel )
00854 {
00855       INT16       *psLastLoc, *pusNoiseGridNo;
00856       INT8        *pbLastLevel;
00857       INT16       sGridNo=-1;
00858       INT8        bLevel, bClosestLevel;
00859       BOOLEAN     fClimbingNecessary, fClosestClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
00860       INT32       iPathCost;
00861       INT16       sClosestDisturbance = NOWHERE;
00862       UINT32      uiLoop;
00863       UINT16      closestConscious = NOWHERE,closestUnconscious = NOWHERE;
00864       INT32       iShortestPath = 1000;
00865       INT32       iShortestPathConscious = 1000,iShortestPathUnconscious = 1000;
00866       UINT8       *pubNoiseVolume;
00867       INT8        *pbNoiseLevel;
00868       INT8        *pbPersOL,*pbPublOL;
00869       INT16       sClimbGridNo;
00870       SOLDIERTYPE * pOpp;
00871 
00872       // CJC: can't trace a path to every known disturbance!
00873       // for starters, try the closest one as the crow flies
00874       INT16       sClosestEnemy = NOWHERE, sDistToClosestEnemy = 1000, sDistToEnemy;
00875 
00876       *pfChangeLevel = FALSE;
00877 
00878       pubNoiseVolume = &gubPublicNoiseVolume[pSoldier->bTeam];
00879       pusNoiseGridNo = &gsPublicNoiseGridno[pSoldier->bTeam];
00880       pbNoiseLevel = &gbPublicNoiseLevel[pSoldier->bTeam];
00881 
00882       // hang pointers at start of this guy's personal and public opponent opplists
00883 //    pbPersOL = &pSoldier->bOppList[0];
00884 //    pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][0]);
00885 //    psLastLoc = &(gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][0]);
00886 
00887       // look through this man's personal & public opplists for opponents known
00888       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00889       {
00890             pOpp = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00891 
00892             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
00893             if (!pOpp)
00894             {
00895                   continue;          // next merc
00896             }
00897 
00898             // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent
00899             if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpp ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpp->bSide) )
00900             {
00901                   continue;          // next merc
00902             }
00903 
00904             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpp->ubID;
00905             pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam] + pOpp->ubID;
00906             psLastLoc = gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID] + pOpp->ubID;
00907             pbLastLevel = gbLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->ubID] + pOpp->ubID;
00908 
00909             // if this opponent is unknown personally and publicly
00910             if ((*pbPersOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN) && (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
00911             {
00912                   continue;          // next merc
00913             }
00914 
00915             // this is possible if get here from BLACK AI in one of those rare
00916             // instances when we couldn't get a meaningful shot off at a guy in sight
00917             if ((*pbPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY) && (pOpp->bLife >= OKLIFE))
00918             {
00919                   // don't allow this to return any valid values, this guy remains a
00920                   // serious threat and the last thing we want to do is approach him!
00921                   return(NOWHERE);
00922             }
00923 
00924             // if personal knowledge is more up to date or at least equal
00925             if ((gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][*pbPersOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE] > 0) ||
00926                    (*pbPersOL == *pbPublOL))
00927             {
00928                   // using personal knowledge, obtain opponent's "best guess" gridno
00929                   sGridNo = *psLastLoc;
00930                   bLevel = *pbLastLevel;
00931             }
00932             else
00933             {
00934                   // using public knowledge, obtain opponent's "best guess" gridno
00935                   sGridNo = gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpp->ubID];
00936                   bLevel = gbPublicLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpp->ubID];
00937             }
00938 
00939             // if we are standing at that gridno (!, obviously our info is old...)
00940             if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00941             {
00942                   continue;          // next merc
00943             }
00944 
00945             if (sGridNo == NOWHERE)
00946             {
00947                   // huh?
00948                   continue;
00949             }
00950 
00951             sDistToEnemy = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
00952             if (sDistToEnemy < sDistToClosestEnemy )
00953             {
00954                   sClosestEnemy = sGridNo;
00955                   bClosestLevel = bLevel;
00956                   sDistToClosestEnemy = sDistToEnemy;
00957             }
00958 
00959       }
00960 
00961       if (sClosestEnemy != NOWHERE)
00962       {
00963             iPathCost = EstimatePathCostToLocation( pSoldier, sClosestEnemy, bClosestLevel, FALSE, &fClimbingNecessary, &sClimbGridNo );
00964             // if we can get there
00965             if (iPathCost != 0)
00966             {
00967                   if (fClimbingNecessary)
00968                   {
00969                         sClosestDisturbance = sClimbGridNo;
00970                   }
00971                   else
00972                   {
00973                         sClosestDisturbance = sClosestEnemy;
00974                   }
00975                   iShortestPath = iPathCost;
00976                   fClosestClimbingNecessary = fClimbingNecessary;
00977             }     
00978       }
00979 
00980       // if any "misc. noise" was also heard recently
00981       if (pSoldier->sNoiseGridno != NOWHERE && pSoldier->sNoiseGridno != sClosestDisturbance)
00982       {
00983             // test this gridno, too
00984             sGridNo = pSoldier->sNoiseGridno;
00985             bLevel = pSoldier->bNoiseLevel;
00986 
00987             // if we are there (at the noise gridno)
00988             if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00989             {
00990                   pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;        // wipe it out, not useful anymore
00991                   pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = 0;
00992             }
00993             else
00994             {
00995                   // get the AP cost to get to the location of the noise
00996                   iPathCost = EstimatePathCostToLocation( pSoldier, sGridNo, bLevel, FALSE, &fClimbingNecessary, &sClimbGridNo );
00997                   // if we can get there
00998                   if (iPathCost != 0)
00999                   {
01000                         if (fClimbingNecessary)
01001                         {
01002                               sClosestDisturbance = sClimbGridNo;
01003                         }
01004                         else
01005                         {
01006                               sClosestDisturbance = sGridNo;
01007                         }
01008                         iShortestPath = iPathCost;
01009                         fClosestClimbingNecessary = fClimbingNecessary;
01010                   }     
01011             }
01012       }
01013 
01014 
01015       // if any PUBLIC "misc. noise" was also heard recently
01016       if (*pusNoiseGridNo != NOWHERE && *pusNoiseGridNo != sClosestDisturbance )
01017       {
01018             // test this gridno, too
01019             sGridNo = *pusNoiseGridNo;
01020             bLevel = *pbNoiseLevel;
01021 
01022             // if we are not NEAR the noise gridno...
01023             if ( pSoldier->bLevel != bLevel || PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) >= 6 || SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, bLevel, 0, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), FALSE ) == 0 )
01024             // if we are NOT there (at the noise gridno)
01025             //    if (sGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo)
01026             {
01027                   // get the AP cost to get to the location of the noise
01028                   iPathCost = EstimatePathCostToLocation( pSoldier, sGridNo, bLevel, FALSE, &fClimbingNecessary, &sClimbGridNo );
01029                   // if we can get there
01030                   if (iPathCost != 0)
01031                   {
01032                         if (fClimbingNecessary)
01033                         {
01034                               sClosestDisturbance = sClimbGridNo;
01035                         }
01036                         else
01037                         {
01038                               sClosestDisturbance = sGridNo;
01039                         }
01040                         iShortestPath = iPathCost;
01041                         fClosestClimbingNecessary = fClimbingNecessary;
01042                   }     
01043             }
01044             else
01045             {
01046                   // degrade our public noise a bit
01047                   *pusNoiseGridNo -= 2;
01048             }
01049       }
01050 
01051 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01052       if (sClosestDisturbance != NOWHERE)
01053       {
01054             AINumMessage("CLOSEST DISTURBANCE is at gridno ",sClosestDisturbance);
01055       }
01056 #endif
01057 
01058       *pfChangeLevel = fClosestClimbingNecessary;
01059       return(sClosestDisturbance);
01060 }
01061 
01062 
01063 INT16 ClosestKnownOpponent(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 * psGridNo, INT8 * pbLevel)
01064 {
01065       INT16 *psLastLoc,sGridNo, sClosestOpponent = NOWHERE;
01066       UINT32 uiLoop;
01067       INT32 iRange, iClosestRange = 1500;
01068       INT8  *pbPersOL,*pbPublOL;
01069       INT8  bLevel, bClosestLevel;
01070       SOLDIERTYPE * pOpp;
01071 
01072       bClosestLevel = -1;
01073 
01074 
01075       // NOTE: THIS FUNCTION ALLOWS RETURN OF UNCONSCIOUS AND UNREACHABLE OPPONENTS
01076       psLastLoc = &(gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][0]);
01077 
01078       // hang pointers at start of this guy's personal and public opponent opplists
01079       pbPersOL = &pSoldier->bOppList[0];
01080       pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][0]);
01081 
01082       // look through this man's personal & public opplists for opponents known
01083       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01084       {
01085             pOpp = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01086 
01087             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
01088             if (!pOpp)
01089             {
01090                   continue;          // next merc
01091             }
01092 
01093             // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent
01094             if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpp ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpp->bSide))
01095             {
01096                   continue;          // next merc
01097             }
01098 
01099             // Special stuff for Carmen the bounty hunter
01100             if (pSoldier->bAttitude == ATTACKSLAYONLY && pOpp->ubProfile != 64)
01101             {
01102                   continue;  // next opponent
01103             }
01104 
01105             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpp->ubID;
01106             pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam] + pOpp->ubID;
01107             psLastLoc = gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID] + pOpp->ubID;
01108 
01109             // if this opponent is unknown personally and publicly
01110             if ((*pbPersOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN) && (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
01111             {
01112                   continue;          // next merc
01113             }
01114 
01115             // if personal knowledge is more up to date or at least equal
01116             if ((gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][*pbPersOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE] > 0) ||
01117                    (*pbPersOL == *pbPublOL))
01118             {
01119                   // using personal knowledge, obtain opponent's "best guess" gridno
01120                   sGridNo = gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID][pOpp->ubID];
01121                   bLevel = gbLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->ubID][pOpp->ubID];
01122             }
01123             else
01124             {
01125                   // using public knowledge, obtain opponent's "best guess" gridno
01126                   sGridNo = gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpp->ubID];
01127                   bLevel = gbPublicLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->bTeam][pOpp->ubID];
01128             }
01129 
01130             // if we are standing at that gridno(!, obviously our info is old...)
01131             if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
01132             {
01133                   continue;          // next merc
01134             }
01135 
01136             // this function is used only for turning towards closest opponent or changing stance
01137             // as such, if they AI is in a building, 
01138             // we should ignore people who are on the roof of the same building as the AI
01139             if ( (bLevel != pSoldier->bLevel) && SameBuilding( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) )
01140             {
01141                   continue;
01142             }
01143 
01144             // I hope this will be good enough; otherwise we need a fractional/world-units-based 2D distance function
01145             //sRange = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo);
01146             iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
01147 
01148             if (iRange < iClosestRange)
01149             {
01150                   iClosestRange = iRange;
01151                   sClosestOpponent = sGridNo;
01152                   bClosestLevel = bLevel;
01153             }
01154       }
01155 
01156 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01157       if (sClosestOpponent != NOWHERE)
01158       {
01159             AINumMessage("CLOSEST OPPONENT is at gridno ",sClosestOpponent);
01160       }
01161 #endif
01162 
01163       if (psGridNo)
01164       {
01165             *psGridNo = sClosestOpponent;
01166       }
01167       if (pbLevel)
01168       {
01169             *pbLevel = bClosestLevel;
01170       }
01171       return( sClosestOpponent );
01172 }
01173 
01174 INT16 ClosestSeenOpponent(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 * psGridNo, INT8 * pbLevel)
01175 {
01176       INT16 sGridNo, sClosestOpponent = NOWHERE;
01177       UINT32 uiLoop;
01178       INT32 iRange, iClosestRange = 1500;
01179       INT8  *pbPersOL;
01180       INT8  bLevel, bClosestLevel;
01181       SOLDIERTYPE * pOpp;
01182 
01183       bClosestLevel = -1;
01184 
01185       // look through this man's personal & public opplists for opponents known
01186       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01187       {
01188             pOpp = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01189 
01190             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
01191             if (!pOpp)
01192             {
01193                   continue;          // next merc
01194             }
01195 
01196             // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent
01197             if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpp ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpp->bSide))
01198             {
01199                   continue;          // next merc
01200             }
01201 
01202             // Special stuff for Carmen the bounty hunter
01203             if (pSoldier->bAttitude == ATTACKSLAYONLY && pOpp->ubProfile != 64)
01204             {
01205                   continue;  // next opponent
01206             }
01207 
01208             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpp->ubID;
01209 
01210             // if this opponent is not seen personally
01211             if (*pbPersOL != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
01212             {
01213                   continue;          // next merc
01214             }
01215 
01216             // since we're dealing with seen people, use exact gridnos
01217             sGridNo = pOpp->sGridNo;
01218             bLevel = pOpp->bLevel;
01219 
01220             // if we are standing at that gridno(!, obviously our info is old...)
01221             if (sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo)
01222             {
01223                   continue;          // next merc
01224             }
01225 
01226             // this function is used only for turning towards closest opponent or changing stance
01227             // as such, if they AI is in a building, 
01228             // we should ignore people who are on the roof of the same building as the AI
01229             if ( (bLevel != pSoldier->bLevel) && SameBuilding( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) )
01230             {
01231                   continue;
01232             }
01233 
01234             // I hope this will be good enough; otherwise we need a fractional/world-units-based 2D distance function
01235             //sRange = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo);
01236             iRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
01237 
01238             if (iRange < iClosestRange)
01239             {
01240                   iClosestRange = iRange;
01241                   sClosestOpponent = sGridNo;
01242                   bClosestLevel = bLevel;
01243             }
01244       }
01245 
01246 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01247       if (sClosestOpponent != NOWHERE)
01248       {
01249             AINumMessage("CLOSEST OPPONENT is at gridno ",sClosestOpponent);
01250       }
01251 #endif
01252 
01253       if (psGridNo)
01254       {
01255             *psGridNo = sClosestOpponent;
01256       }
01257       if (pbLevel)
01258       {
01259             *pbLevel = bClosestLevel;
01260       }
01261       return( sClosestOpponent );
01262 }
01263 
01264 
01265 INT16 ClosestPC( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 * psDistance )
01266 {
01267       // used by NPCs... find the closest PC
01268 
01269       // NOTE: skips EPCs!
01270 
01271       UINT8                         ubLoop;
01272       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTargetSoldier;
01273       INT16                         sMinDist = (INT16)WORLD_MAX;
01274       INT16                         sDist;
01275       INT16                         sGridNo = NOWHERE;
01276 
01277       // Loop through all mercs on player team
01278       ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01279 
01280       for ( ; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++)
01281       { 
01282             pTargetSoldier = Menptr + ubLoop;
01283 
01284             if (!pTargetSoldier->bActive || !pTargetSoldier->bInSector)
01285             {
01286                   continue;
01287             }
01288             
01289             // if not conscious, skip him
01290             if (pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
01291             {
01292                continue;
01293             }
01294 
01295             if ( AM_AN_EPC( pTargetSoldier ) )
01296             {
01297                   continue;
01298             }
01299 
01300             sDist = PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pTargetSoldier->sGridNo);
01301             
01302             // if this PC is not visible to the soldier, then add a penalty to the distance
01303             // so that we weight in favour of visible mercs
01304             if ( pTargetSoldier->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam && pSoldier->bOppList[ ubLoop ] != SEEN_CURRENTLY )
01305             {
01306                   sDist += 10;
01307             }
01308 
01309             if (sDist < sMinDist)
01310             {
01311                   sMinDist = sDist;
01312                   sGridNo = pTargetSoldier->sGridNo;
01313             }           
01314       }
01315 
01316       if ( psDistance )
01317       {
01318             *psDistance = sMinDist;
01319       }
01320 
01321       return( sGridNo );
01322 }
01323 
01324 INT16 FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sStartGridNo, INT16 sDesiredGridNo, BOOLEAN fClimbUp )
01325 {
01326       INT16 sGridNo;
01327       INT16 sRoamingOrigin;
01328       INT16 sRoamingRange;
01329 
01330       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC )
01331       {
01332             sRoamingOrigin = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01333             sRoamingRange = 99;
01334       }
01335       else
01336       {
01337             sRoamingRange = RoamingRange( pSoldier, &sRoamingOrigin );
01338       }
01339 
01340       // since climbing necessary involves going an extra tile, we compare against 1 less than the roam range... 
01341       // or add 1 to the distance to the climb point
01342 
01343       sGridNo = FindClosestClimbPoint( sStartGridNo, sDesiredGridNo, fClimbUp );
01344 
01345 
01346       if ( PythSpacesAway( sRoamingOrigin, sGridNo ) + 1 > sRoamingRange )
01347       {
01348             return( NOWHERE );
01349       }
01350       else
01351       {
01352             return( sGridNo );
01353       }
01354 }
01355 
01356 BOOLEAN ClimbingNecessary( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sDestGridNo, INT8 bDestLevel )
01357 {
01358       if (pSoldier->bLevel == bDestLevel)
01359       {
01360             if ( (pSoldier->bLevel == 0) || ( gubBuildingInfo[ pSoldier->sGridNo ] == gubBuildingInfo[ sDestGridNo ] ) )
01361             {
01362                   return( FALSE );
01363             }
01364             else // different buildings!
01365             {
01366                   return( TRUE );
01367             }
01368       }
01369       else
01370       {
01371             return( TRUE );
01372       }
01373 }
01374 
01375 INT16 GetInterveningClimbingLocation( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sDestGridNo, INT8 bDestLevel, BOOLEAN * pfClimbingNecessary )
01376 {
01377       if (pSoldier->bLevel == bDestLevel)
01378       {
01379             if ( (pSoldier->bLevel == 0) || ( gubBuildingInfo[ pSoldier->sGridNo ] == gubBuildingInfo[ sDestGridNo ] ) )
01380             {
01381                   // on ground or same building... normal!
01382                   *pfClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
01383                   return( NOWHERE );
01384             }
01385             else
01386             {
01387                   // different buildings!
01388                   // yes, pass in same gridno twice... want closest climb-down spot for building we are on!
01389                   *pfClimbingNecessary = TRUE;
01390                   return( FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE ) );
01391             }
01392       }
01393       else
01394       {
01395             *pfClimbingNecessary = TRUE;
01396             // different levels
01397             if (pSoldier->bLevel == 0)
01398             {
01399                   // got to go UP onto building
01400                   return( FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, sDestGridNo, TRUE ) );
01401             }
01402             else
01403             {
01404                   // got to go DOWN off building
01405                   return( FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE ) );
01406             }
01407       }
01408 }
01409 
01410 INT16 EstimatePathCostToLocation( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sDestGridNo, INT8 bDestLevel, BOOLEAN fAddCostAfterClimbingUp, BOOLEAN * pfClimbingNecessary, INT16 * psClimbGridNo )
01411 {
01412       INT16 sPathCost;
01413       INT16 sClimbGridNo;
01414 
01415       if (pSoldier->bLevel == bDestLevel)
01416       {
01417             if ( (pSoldier->bLevel == 0) || ( gubBuildingInfo[ pSoldier->sGridNo ] == gubBuildingInfo[ sDestGridNo ] ) )
01418             {
01419                   // on ground or same building... normal!
01420                   sPathCost = EstimatePlotPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, WALKING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
01421                   *pfClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
01422                   *psClimbGridNo = NOWHERE;
01423             }
01424             else
01425             {
01426                   // different buildings!
01427                   // yes, pass in same gridno twice... want closest climb-down spot for building we are on!
01428                   sClimbGridNo = FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
01429                   if (sClimbGridNo == NOWHERE)
01430                   {
01431                         sPathCost = 0;
01432                   }
01433                   else
01434                   {
01435                         sPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sClimbGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, WALKING, FALSE, FALSE, 0 );
01436                         if (sPathCost != 0)
01437                         {
01438                               // add in cost of climbing down
01439                               if (fAddCostAfterClimbingUp)
01440                               {
01441                                     // add in cost of later climbing up, too
01442                                     sPathCost += AP_CLIMBOFFROOF + AP_CLIMBROOF;
01443                                     // add in an estimate of getting there after climbing down
01444                                     sPathCost += (AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT + WALKCOST) * PythSpacesAway( sClimbGridNo, sDestGridNo );
01445                               }
01446                               else
01447                               {
01448                                     sPathCost += AP_CLIMBOFFROOF;
01449                                     // add in an estimate of getting there after climbing down, *but not on top of roof*
01450                                     sPathCost += (AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT + WALKCOST) * PythSpacesAway( sClimbGridNo, sDestGridNo ) / 2;
01451                               }
01452                               *pfClimbingNecessary = TRUE;
01453                               *psClimbGridNo = sClimbGridNo;
01454                         }
01455                   }
01456             }
01457       }
01458       else
01459       {
01460             // different levels
01461             if (pSoldier->bLevel == 0)
01462             {
01463                   //got to go UP onto building
01464                   sClimbGridNo = FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier,  pSoldier->sGridNo, sDestGridNo, TRUE );
01465             }
01466             else
01467             {
01468                   // got to go DOWN off building
01469                   sClimbGridNo = FindClosestClimbPointAvailableToAI( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
01470             }
01471 
01472             if (sClimbGridNo == NOWHERE)
01473             {
01474                   sPathCost = 0;
01475             }
01476             else
01477             {
01478                   sPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sClimbGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, WALKING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
01479                   if (sPathCost != 0)
01480                   {
01481                         // add in the cost of climbing up or down
01482                         if (pSoldier->bLevel == 0)
01483                         {
01484                               // must climb up
01485                               sPathCost += AP_CLIMBROOF;
01486                               if (fAddCostAfterClimbingUp)
01487                               {
01488                                     // add to path a rough estimate of how far to go from the climb gridno to the friend
01489                                     // estimate walk cost
01490                                     sPathCost += (AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT + WALKCOST) * PythSpacesAway( sClimbGridNo, sDestGridNo );
01491                               }
01492                         }
01493                         else
01494                         {
01495                               // must climb down
01496                               sPathCost += AP_CLIMBOFFROOF;
01497                               // add to path a rough estimate of how far to go from the climb gridno to the friend
01498                               // estimate walk cost
01499                               sPathCost += (AP_MOVEMENT_FLAT + WALKCOST) * PythSpacesAway( sClimbGridNo, sDestGridNo );
01500                         }
01501                         *pfClimbingNecessary = TRUE;
01502                         *psClimbGridNo = sClimbGridNo;
01503                   }
01504             }
01505       }
01506 
01507       return( sPathCost );
01508 }
01509 
01510 BOOLEAN GuySawEnemyThisTurnOrBefore( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01511 {
01512       UINT8       ubTeamLoop;
01513       UINT8       ubIDLoop;
01514 
01515       for ( ubTeamLoop = 0; ubTeamLoop < MAXTEAMS; ubTeamLoop++ )
01516       {
01517             if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeamLoop ].bSide != pSoldier->bSide )
01518             {
01519                   // consider guys in this team, which isn't on our side
01520                   for ( ubIDLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeamLoop ].bFirstID; ubIDLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeamLoop ].bLastID; ubIDLoop++ )
01521                   {
01522                         // if this guy SAW an enemy recently...
01523                         if ( pSoldier->bOppList[ ubIDLoop ] >= SEEN_CURRENTLY )
01524                         {
01525                               return( TRUE );
01526                         }
01527                   }
01528             }                 
01529       }
01530 
01531       return( FALSE );
01532 }
01533 
01534 INT16 ClosestReachableFriendInTrouble(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN * pfClimbingNecessary)
01535 {
01536       UINT32 uiLoop;
01537       INT16 sPathCost, sClosestFriend = NOWHERE, sShortestPath = 1000, sClimbGridNo;
01538       BOOLEAN fClimbingNecessary, fClosestClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
01539       SOLDIERTYPE *pFriend;
01540 
01541       // civilians don't really have any "friends", so they don't bother with this
01542       if (PTR_CIVILIAN)
01543       {
01544             return(sClosestFriend);
01545       }
01546 
01547       // consider every friend of this soldier (locations assumed to be known)
01548       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01549       {
01550             pFriend = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01551 
01552             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
01553             if (!pFriend)
01554             {
01555                   continue;          // next merc
01556             }
01557 
01558             // if this merc is neutral or NOT on the same side, he's not a friend
01559             if (pFriend->bNeutral || (pSoldier->bSide != pFriend->bSide))
01560             {
01561                   continue;          // next merc
01562             }
01563 
01564             // if this "friend" is actually US
01565             if (pFriend->ubID == pSoldier->ubID)
01566             {
01567                   continue;          // next merc
01568             }
01569 
01570             // CJC: restrict "last one to radio" to only if that guy saw us this turn or last turn
01571 
01572             // if this friend is not under fire, and isn't the last one to radio
01573             if ( ! ( pFriend->bUnderFire || (pFriend->ubID == gTacticalStatus.Team[pFriend->bTeam].ubLastMercToRadio && GuySawEnemyThisTurnOrBefore( pFriend ) ) ) )
01574             {
01575                   continue;          // next merc
01576             }
01577 
01578             // if we're already neighbors
01579             if (SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pFriend->sGridNo) == 1)
01580             {
01581                   continue;          // next merc
01582             }
01583 
01584             // get the AP cost to go to this friend's gridno
01585             sPathCost = EstimatePathCostToLocation( pSoldier, pFriend->sGridNo, pFriend->bLevel, TRUE, &fClimbingNecessary, &sClimbGridNo );
01586 
01587             // if we can get there
01588             if (sPathCost != 0)
01589             {
01590                   //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"Path cost to friend %s's location is %d",pFriend->name,pathCost);
01591                   //PopMessage(tempstr);
01592 
01593                   if (sPathCost < sShortestPath)
01594                   {
01595                         if (fClimbingNecessary)
01596                         {
01597                               sClosestFriend = sClimbGridNo;
01598                         }
01599                         else
01600                         {
01601                               sClosestFriend = pFriend->sGridNo;
01602                         }
01603 
01604                         sShortestPath = sPathCost;
01605                         fClosestClimbingNecessary = fClimbingNecessary;
01606                   }
01607             }
01608       }
01609 
01610 
01611 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
01612       if (sClosestFriend != NOWHERE)
01613       {
01614             AINumMessage("CLOSEST FRIEND is at gridno ",sClosestFriend);
01615       }
01616 #endif
01617 
01618       *pfClimbingNecessary = fClosestClimbingNecessary;
01619       return(sClosestFriend);
01620 }
01621 
01622 INT16 DistanceToClosestFriend( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01623 {
01624       // find the distance to the closest person on the same team
01625       UINT8                         ubLoop;
01626       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTargetSoldier;
01627       INT16                         sMinDist = 1000;
01628       INT16                         sDist;
01629 
01630       // Loop through all mercs on player team
01631       ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
01632 
01633       for ( ; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; ubLoop++ )
01634       { 
01635             if (ubLoop == pSoldier->ubID)
01636             {
01637                   // same guy - continue!
01638                   continue;
01639             }
01640 
01641             pTargetSoldier = Menptr + ubLoop;
01642 
01643             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
01644             {
01645                   if (!pTargetSoldier->bActive || !pTargetSoldier->bInSector)
01646                   {
01647                         continue;
01648                   }
01649                   // if not conscious, skip him
01650                   else if (pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
01651                   {
01652                          continue;
01653                   }
01654             }
01655             else
01656             {
01657                   // compare sector #s
01658                   if ( (pSoldier->sSectorX != pTargetSoldier->sSectorX) ||
01659                         (pSoldier->sSectorY != pTargetSoldier->sSectorY) ||
01660                         (pSoldier->bSectorZ != pTargetSoldier->bSectorZ) )
01661                   {
01662                         continue;
01663                   }
01664                   else if (pTargetSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
01665                   {
01666                          continue;
01667                   }
01668                   else
01669                   {
01670                         // well there's someone who could be near
01671                         return( 1 );
01672                   }
01673             }
01674             
01675             sDist = SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pTargetSoldier->sGridNo);
01676             
01677             if (sDist < sMinDist)
01678             {
01679                   sMinDist = sDist;
01680             }           
01681       }
01682 
01683       return( sMinDist );
01684 }
01685 
01686 BOOLEAN InWaterGasOrSmoke( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
01687 {
01688       if (WaterTooDeepForAttacks( sGridNo ))
01689       {
01690             return(TRUE);
01691       }
01692 
01693       // smoke
01694       if (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[ pSoldier->bLevel ] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE)
01695       {
01696             return( TRUE );
01697       }
01698 
01699       // tear/mustard gas
01700       //if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[ pSoldier->bLevel ] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
01701       //                (pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem != GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem != GASMASK) )
01702       if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[ pSoldier->bLevel ] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
01703                         FindGasMask(pSoldier) == NO_SLOT ) 
01704       {
01705             return( TRUE );
01706       }
01707       if ( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[ pSoldier->bLevel ] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS ) 
01708       {
01709             return( TRUE );
01710       }
01711 
01712       return(FALSE);
01713 }
01714 
01715 BOOLEAN InGasOrSmoke( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
01716 {
01717       // smoke
01718       if (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE)
01719       {
01720             return( TRUE );
01721       }
01722 
01723       // tear/mustard gas
01724       //if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
01725       //                (pSoldier->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem != GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem != GASMASK) )
01726       if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
01727                         FindGasMask(pSoldier) == NO_SLOT  )
01728       {
01729             return( TRUE );
01730       }
01731       if ( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
01732       {
01733             return( TRUE );
01734       }
01735 
01736       return(FALSE);
01737 }
