01760 
01761 BOOLEAN InGas( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
01762 {
01763       // tear/mustard gas
01764       if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
01765                         FindGasMask(pSoldier) == NO_SLOT )
01766       {
01767             return( TRUE );
01768       }
01769       if ( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
01770       {
01771             return( TRUE );
01772       }
01773 
01774       return(FALSE);
01775 }
01776 
01777 BOOLEAN WearGasMaskIfAvailable( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01778 {
01779       INT8        bSlot, bNewSlot;
01780 
01781       bSlot = FindGasMask( pSoldier );
01782       if ( bSlot == NO_SLOT )
01783       {
01784             return( FALSE );
01785       }
01786       if ( bSlot == HEAD1POS || bSlot == HEAD2POS )
01787       {
01788             return( FALSE );
01789       }
01790       if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == NOTHING)
01791       {
01792             bNewSlot = HEAD1POS;
01793       }
01794       else if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == NOTHING )
01795       {
01796             bNewSlot = HEAD2POS;
01797       }
01798       else
01799       {
01800             // screw it, going in position 1 anyhow
01801             bNewSlot = HEAD1POS;
01802       }
01803 
01804       RearrangePocket( pSoldier, bSlot, bNewSlot, TRUE );
01805       return( TRUE );
01806 }
01807 
01808 BOOLEAN InLightAtNight( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
01809 {
01810       UINT8 ubBackgroundLightLevel;
01811       
01812       // do not consider us to be "in light" if we're in an underground sector
01813       if ( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01814       {
01815             return( FALSE );
01816       }
01817 
01818       ubBackgroundLightLevel = GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel();
01819 
01820       if ( ubBackgroundLightLevel < NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY + 2 )
01821       {
01822             // don't consider it nighttime, too close to daylight levels
01823             return( FALSE );
01824       }
01825 
01826       // could've been placed here, ignore the light
01827       if ( InARoom( sGridNo, NULL ) )
01828       {
01829             return( FALSE );
01830       }
01831 
01832       // NB light levels are backwards, so a lower light level means the 
01833       // spot in question is BRIGHTER
01834 
01835       if ( LightTrueLevel( sGridNo, bLevel ) < ubBackgroundLightLevel )
01836       {
01837             return( TRUE );
01838       }
01839 
01840       return( FALSE );
01841 }
01842 
01843 INT8 CalcMorale(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
01844 {
01845  UINT32 uiLoop, uiLoop2;
01846  INT32 iOurTotalThreat = 0, iTheirTotalThreat = 0;
01847  INT16 sOppThreatValue, sFrndThreatValue, sMorale;
01848  INT32 iPercent;
01849  INT8 bMostRecentOpplistValue;
01850  INT8 bMoraleCategory;
01851  UINT8 *pSeenOpp; //,*friendOlPtr;
01852  INT8  *pbPersOL, *pbPublOL;
01853  SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent,*pFriend;
01854 
01855  // if army guy has NO weapons left then panic!
01856  if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01857  {
01858        if ( FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON ) == NO_SLOT )
01859        {
01860              return( MORALE_HOPELESS );
01861        }
01862  }
01863 
01864  // hang pointers to my personal opplist, my team's public opplist, and my
01865  // list of previously seen opponents
01866  pSeenOpp  = (UINT8 *) &(gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID][0]);
01867 
01868  // loop through every one of my possible opponents
01869  for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
01870  {
01871       pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
01872 
01873    // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, dead, unconscious
01874    if (!pOpponent || (pOpponent->bLife < OKLIFE))
01875      continue;          // next merc
01876 
01877    // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent, skip him!
01878    if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpponent->bSide))
01879      continue;          // next merc
01880 
01881             // Special stuff for Carmen the bounty hunter
01882             if (pSoldier->bAttitude == ATTACKSLAYONLY && pOpponent->ubProfile != 64)
01883             {
01884                   continue;  // next opponent
01885             }
01886 
01887        pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
01888        pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam] + pOpponent->ubID;
01889        pSeenOpp = (UINT8 *)gbSeenOpponents[pSoldier->ubID] + pOpponent->ubID;
01890 
01891    // if this opponent is unknown to me personally AND unknown to my team, too
01892    if ((*pbPersOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN) && (*pbPublOL == NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN))
01893     {
01894      // if I have never seen him before anywhere in this sector, either
01895      if (!(*pSeenOpp))
01896        continue;        // next merc
01897 
01898      // have seen him in the past, so he remains something of a threat
01899      bMostRecentOpplistValue = 0;        // uses the free slot for 0 opplist
01900     }
01901    else         // decide which opplist is more current
01902     {
01903      // if personal knowledge is more up to date or at least equal
01904      if ((gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][*pbPersOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE] > 0) || (*pbPersOL == *pbPublOL))
01905        bMostRecentOpplistValue = *pbPersOL;      // use personal
01906      else
01907        bMostRecentOpplistValue = *pbPublOL;      // use public
01908     }
01909 
01910    iPercent = ThreatPercent[bMostRecentOpplistValue - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE];
01911 
01912    sOppThreatValue = (iPercent * CalcManThreatValue(pOpponent,pSoldier->sGridNo,FALSE,pSoldier)) / 100;
01913 
01914    //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"Known opponent %s, opplist status %d, percent %d, threat = %d",
01915    //           ExtMen[pOpponent->ubID].name,ubMostRecentOpplistValue,ubPercent,sOppThreatValue);
01916    //PopMessage(tempstr);
01917 
01918    // ADD this to their running total threatValue (decreases my MORALE)
01919    iTheirTotalThreat += sOppThreatValue;
01920    //NumMessage("Their TOTAL threat now = ",sTheirTotalThreat);
01921 
01922    // NOW THE FUN PART: SINCE THIS OPPONENT IS KNOWN TO ME IN SOME WAY,
01923    // ANY FRIENDS OF MINE THAT KNOW ABOUT HIM BOOST MY MORALE.  SO, LET'S GO
01924    // THROUGH THEIR PERSONAL OPPLISTS AND CHECK WHICH OF MY FRIENDS KNOW
01925    // SOMETHING ABOUT HIM AND WHAT THEIR THREAT VALUE TO HIM IS.
01926 
01927    for (uiLoop2 = 0; uiLoop2 < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop2++)
01928     {
01929      pFriend = MercSlots[ uiLoop2 ];
01930 
01931      // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, dead, unconscious
01932      if (!pFriend || (pFriend->bLife < OKLIFE))
01933        continue;        // next merc
01934 
01935      // if this merc is not on my side, then he's NOT one of my friends
01936 
01937      // WE CAN'T AFFORD TO CONSIDER THE ENEMY OF MY ENEMY MY FRIEND, HERE!
01938      // ONLY IF WE ARE ACTUALLY OFFICIALLY CO-OPERATING TOGETHER (SAME SIDE)
01939      if ( pFriend->bNeutral && !( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == pFriend->ubCivilianGroup ) )
01940              {
01941                    continue;        // next merc
01942              }
01943              
01944              if ( pSoldier->bSide != pFriend->bSide )
01945        continue;        // next merc
01946 
01947      // THIS TEST IS INVALID IF A COMPUTER-TEAM IS PLAYING CO-OPERATIVELY
01948      // WITH A NON-COMPUTER TEAM SINCE THE OPPLISTS INVOLVED ARE NOT
01949      // UP-TO-DATE.  THIS SITUATION IS CURRENTLY NOT POSSIBLE IN HTH/DG.
01950 
01951      // ALSO NOTE THAT WE COUNT US AS OUR (BEST) FRIEND FOR THESE CALCULATIONS
01952 
01953                   // subtract HEARD_2_TURNS_AGO (which is negative) to make values start at 0 and
01954                   // be positive otherwise
01955      iPercent = ThreatPercent[pFriend->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID] - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE];
01956 
01957        // reduce the percentage value based on how far away they are from the enemy, if they only hear him
01958        if ( pFriend->bOppList[ pOpponent->ubID ] <= HEARD_LAST_TURN )
01959        {
01960              iPercent -= PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pFriend->sGridNo ) * 2;
01961              if ( iPercent <= 0 )
01962              {
01963                    //ignore!
01964                    continue;
01965              }
01966        }
01967 
01968      sFrndThreatValue = (iPercent * CalcManThreatValue(pFriend,pOpponent->sGridNo,FALSE,pSoldier)) / 100;
01969 
01970      //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"Known by friend %s, opplist status %d, percent %d, threat = %d",
01971      //         ExtMen[pFriend->ubID].name,pFriend->bOppList[pOpponent->ubID],ubPercent,sFrndThreatValue);
01972      //PopMessage(tempstr);
01973 
01974      // ADD this to our running total threatValue (increases my MORALE)
01975      // We multiply by sOppThreatValue to PRO-RATE this based on opponent's
01976      // threat value to ME personally.  Divide later by sum of them all.
01977      iOurTotalThreat += sOppThreatValue * sFrndThreatValue;
01978     }
01979 
01980    // this could get slow if I have a lot of friends...
01981    //KeepInterfaceGoing();
01982   }
01983 
01984 
01985  // if they are no threat whatsoever
01986  if (!iTheirTotalThreat)
01987    sMorale = 500;        // our morale is just incredible
01988  else
01989   {
01990    // now divide sOutTotalThreat by sTheirTotalThreat to get the REAL value
01991    iOurTotalThreat /= iTheirTotalThreat;
01992 
01993    // calculate the morale (100 is even, < 100 is us losing, > 100 is good)
01994    sMorale = (INT16) ((100 * iOurTotalThreat) / iTheirTotalThreat);
01995   }
01996 
01997 
01998  if (sMorale <= 25)              // odds 1:4 or worse
01999    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_HOPELESS;
02000  else if (sMorale <= 50)         // odds between 1:4 and 1:2
02001    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_WORRIED;
02002  else if (sMorale <= 150)        // odds between 1:2 and 3:2
02003    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_NORMAL;
02004  else if (sMorale <= 300)        // odds between 3:2 and 3:1
02005    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_CONFIDENT;
02006  else                           // odds better than 3:1
02007    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_FEARLESS;
02008 
02009 
02010  switch (pSoldier->bAttitude)
02011   {
02012    case DEFENSIVE:      bMoraleCategory--; break;
02013    case BRAVESOLO:      bMoraleCategory += 2; break;
02014    case BRAVEAID: bMoraleCategory += 2; break;
02015    case CUNNINGSOLO:    break;
02016    case CUNNINGAID:     break;
02017    case AGGRESSIVE:     bMoraleCategory++; break;
02018   }
02019 
02020  // make idiot administrators much more aggressive
02021  if ( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR )
02022  {
02023        bMoraleCategory += 2;
02024  }
02025 
02026 
02027  // if still full of energy
02028  if (pSoldier->bBreath > 75)
02029    bMoraleCategory++;
02030  else
02031   {
02032    // if getting a bit low on breath
02033    if (pSoldier->bBreath < 40)
02034      bMoraleCategory--;
02035 
02036    // if getting REALLY low on breath
02037    if (pSoldier->bBreath < 10)
02038      bMoraleCategory--;
02039   }
02040 
02041 
02042  // if still very healthy
02043  if (pSoldier->bLife > 75)
02044    bMoraleCategory++;
02045  else
02046   {
02047    // if getting a bit low on life
02048    if (pSoldier->bLife < 40)
02049      bMoraleCategory--;
02050 
02051    // if getting REALLY low on life
02052    if (pSoldier->bLife < 20)
02053      bMoraleCategory--;
02054   }
02055 
02056 
02057  // if soldier is currently not under fire
02058  if (!pSoldier->bUnderFire)
02059    bMoraleCategory++;
02060 
02061 
02062  // if adjustments made it outside the allowed limits
02063  if (bMoraleCategory < MORALE_HOPELESS)
02064    bMoraleCategory = MORALE_HOPELESS;
02065  else
02066   {
02067    if (bMoraleCategory > MORALE_FEARLESS)
02068      bMoraleCategory = MORALE_FEARLESS;
02069   }
02070 
02071  // if only 1/4 of side left, reduce morale
02072  // and do this after we've capped all those other silly values
02073  /*
02074  if ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector <= gTacticalStatus.bOriginalSizeOfEnemyForce / 4 )
02075  {
02076       bMoraleCategory -= 2;
02077   if (bMoraleCategory < MORALE_HOPELESS)
02078     bMoraleCategory = MORALE_HOPELESS;
02079  }
02080  */
02081 
02082  // brave guys never get hopeless, at worst they get worried
02083  if (bMoraleCategory == MORALE_HOPELESS &&
02084      (pSoldier->bAttitude == BRAVESOLO || pSoldier->bAttitude == BRAVEAID))
02085   bMoraleCategory = MORALE_WORRIED;
02086 
02087 
02088 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
02089             STR tempstr;
02090              sprintf((CHAR *) tempstr, "Morale = %d (category %d)\n",
02091             pSoldier->bMorale,bMoraleCategory);
02092       DebugAI (tempstr);
02093 #endif
02094 
02095  return(bMoraleCategory);
02096 }
02097 
02098 INT32 CalcManThreatValue( SOLDIERTYPE *pEnemy, INT16 sMyGrid, UINT8 ubReduceForCover, SOLDIERTYPE * pMe )
02099 {
02100       INT32 iThreatValue = 0;
02101       BOOLEAN fForCreature = CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pMe );
02102 
02103       // If man is inactive, at base, on assignment, dead, unconscious
02104       if (!pEnemy->bActive || !pEnemy->bInSector || !pEnemy->bLife)
02105       {
02106             // he's no threat at all, return a negative number
02107             iThreatValue = -999;
02108             return(iThreatValue);
02109       }
02110 
02111       // in boxing mode, let only a boxer be considered a threat.
02112       if ( (gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING) && !(pEnemy->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER) )
02113       {
02114             iThreatValue = -999;
02115             return( iThreatValue );
02116       }
02117 
02118       if (fForCreature)
02119       {
02120             // health (1-100)
02121             iThreatValue += pEnemy->bLife;
02122             // bleeding (more attactive!) (1-100)
02123             iThreatValue += pEnemy->bBleeding;
02124             // decrease according to distance
02125             iThreatValue = (iThreatValue * 10) / (10 + PythSpacesAway( sMyGrid, pEnemy->sGridNo ) );
02126 
02127       }
02128       else
02129       {
02130             // ADD twice the man's level (2-20)
02131             iThreatValue += pEnemy->bExpLevel;
02132 
02133             // ADD man's total action points (10-35)
02134             iThreatValue += CalcActionPoints(pEnemy);
02135 
02136             // ADD 1/2 of man's current action points (4-17)
02137             iThreatValue += (pEnemy->bActionPoints / 2);
02138 
02139             // ADD 1/10 of man's current health (0-10)
02140             iThreatValue += (pEnemy->bLife / 10);
02141 
02142             if (pEnemy->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
02143             {
02144                   // ADD 1/4 of man's protection percentage (0-25)
02145                   iThreatValue += ArmourPercent( pEnemy ) / 4;
02146 
02147                   // ADD 1/5 of man's marksmanship skill (0-20)
02148                   iThreatValue += (pEnemy->bMarksmanship / 5);
02149 
02150                   if ( Item[ pEnemy->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
02151                   {
02152                         // ADD the deadliness of the item(weapon) he's holding (0-50)
02153                         iThreatValue += Weapon[pEnemy->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].ubDeadliness;
02154                   }
02155             }
02156 
02157             // SUBTRACT 1/5 of man's bleeding (0-20)
02158             iThreatValue -= (pEnemy->bBleeding / 5);
02159 
02160             // SUBTRACT 1/10 of man's breath deficiency (0-10)
02161             iThreatValue -= ((100 - pEnemy->bBreath) / 10);
02162 
02163             // SUBTRACT man's current shock value
02164             iThreatValue -= pEnemy->bShock;
02165       }
02166 
02167       // if I have a specifically defined spot where I'm at (sometime I don't!)
02168       if (sMyGrid != NOWHERE)
02169       {
02170             // ADD 10% if man's already been shooting at me
02171             if (pEnemy->sLastTarget == sMyGrid)
02172             {
02173                   iThreatValue += (iThreatValue / 10);
02174             }
02175             else
02176             {
02177                   // ADD 5% if man's already facing me
02178                   if (pEnemy->bDirection == atan8(CenterX(pEnemy->sGridNo),CenterY(pEnemy->sGridNo),CenterX(sMyGrid),CenterY(sMyGrid)))
02179                   {
02180                         iThreatValue += (iThreatValue / 20);
02181                   }
02182             }
02183       }
02184 
02185       // if this man is conscious
02186       if (pEnemy->bLife >= OKLIFE)
02187       {
02188             // and we were told to reduce threat for my cover
02189             if (ubReduceForCover && (sMyGrid != NOWHERE))
02190             {
02191                   // Reduce iThreatValue to same % as the chance HE has shoot through at ME
02192                   //iThreatValue = (iThreatValue * ChanceToGetThrough( pEnemy, myGrid, FAKE, ACTUAL, TESTWALLS, 9999, M9PISTOL, NOT_FOR_LOS)) / 100;
02193                   //iThreatValue = (iThreatValue * SoldierTo3DLocationChanceToGetThrough( pEnemy, myGrid, FAKE, ACTUAL, TESTWALLS, 9999, M9PISTOL, NOT_FOR_LOS)) / 100;
02194                   iThreatValue = (iThreatValue * SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( pEnemy, sMyGrid, pMe->bLevel, 0, pMe->ubID ) ) / 100;
02195             }
02196       }
02197       else
02198       {
02199             // if he's still something of a threat
02200             if (iThreatValue > 0)
02201             {
02202                   // drastically reduce his threat value (divide by 5 to 18)
02203                   iThreatValue /= (4 + (OKLIFE - pEnemy->bLife));
02204             }
02205       }
02206 
02207       // threat value of any opponent can never drop below 1
02208       if (iThreatValue < 1)
02209       {
02210             iThreatValue = 1;
02211       }
02212 
02213       //sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s's iThreatValue = ",pEnemy->name);
02214       //NumMessage(tempstr,iThreatValue);
02215 
02216 #ifdef BETAVERSION      // unnecessary for real release
02217       // NOTE: maximum is about 200 for a healthy Mike type with a mortar!
02218       if (iThreatValue > 250)
02219       {
02220             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"CalcManThreatValue: WARNING - %d has a very high threat value of %d",pEnemy->ubID,iThreatValue);
02221 
02222 #ifdef RECORDNET
02223             fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\t%s\n",tempstr);
02224 #endif
02225 
02226 #ifdef TESTVERSION
02227             PopMessage(tempstr);
02228 #endif
02229 
02230       }
02231 #endif
02232 
02233       return(iThreatValue);
02234 }
02235 
02236 INT16 RoamingRange(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 * pusFromGridNo)
02237 {
02238       if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
02239       {
02240             if ( pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_BLACK )
02241             {
02242                   *pusFromGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo; // from current position!
02243                   return(MAX_ROAMING_RANGE);
02244             }
02245       }
02246       if ( pSoldier->bOrders == POINTPATROL || pSoldier->bOrders == RNDPTPATROL )
02247       {
02248             // roam near NEXT PATROL POINT, not from where merc starts out
02249             *pusFromGridNo = pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt];
02250       }
02251       else
02252       {
02253             // roam around where mercs started
02254             //*pusFromGridNo = pSoldier->sInitialGridNo;
02255             *pusFromGridNo = pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0];
02256       }
02257 
02258       switch (pSoldier->bOrders)
02259       {
02260             // JA2 GOLD: give non-NPCs a 5 tile roam range for cover in combat when being shot at
02261             case STATIONARY:              if (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE || (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_BLACK && !(pSoldier->bUnderFire)))
02262                                                       {
02263                                                             return( 0 );
02264                                                       }
02265                                                       else
02266                                                       {
02267                                                             return( 5 );
02268                                                       }           case ONGUARD:                             return( 5 );
02269             case CLOSEPATROL:             return( 15 );
02270             case RNDPTPATROL:
02271             case POINTPATROL:             return(10 );     // from nextPatrolGrid, not whereIWas
02272             case FARPATROL:                     if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
02273                                                                               {
02274                                                                                     return( 25 );
02275                                                                               }
02276                                                                               else
02277                                                                               {
02278                                                                                     return( 50 );
02279                                                                               }
02280             case ONCALL:                              if (pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED)
02281                                                                               {
02282                                                                                     return( 10 );
02283                                                                               }
02284                                                                               else
02285                                                                               {
02286                                                                                     return( 30 );
02287                                                                               }                                   
02288             case SEEKENEMY:                     *pusFromGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo; // from current position!
02289                                                                               return(MAX_ROAMING_RANGE);
02290             default:
02291 #ifdef BETAVERSION
02292                   sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s has invalid orders = %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->bOrders);
02293                   PopMessage(tempstr);
02294 #endif
02295                   return(0);
02296       }
02297 }
02298 
02299 
02300 void RearrangePocket(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bPocket1, INT8 bPocket2, UINT8 bPermanent)
02301 {
02302       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"RearrangePocket");
02303       // NB there's no such thing as a temporary swap for now...
02304       SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[bPocket1]), &(pSoldier->inv[bPocket2]) );
02305       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"RearrangePocket done");
02306 }
02307 
02308 BOOLEAN FindBetterSpotForItem( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bSlot )
02309 {
02310       // looks for a place in the slots to put an item in a hand or armour
02311       // position, and moves it there.
02312       if (bSlot >= BIGPOCK1POS)
02313       {
02314             return( FALSE );
02315       }
02316       if (pSoldier->inv[bSlot].usItem == NOTHING)
02317       {
02318             // well that's just fine then!
02319             return( TRUE );
02320       }
02321 
02322       if (Item[pSoldier->inv[bSlot].usItem].ubPerPocket == 0)
02323       {
02324             // then we're looking for a big pocket
02325             bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, BIGPOCK1POS, BIGPOCK4POS );
02326       }
02327       else
02328       {
02329             // try a small pocket first
02330             bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, SMALLPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
02331             if (bSlot == NO_SLOT)
02332             {
02333                   bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, BIGPOCK1POS, BIGPOCK4POS );
02334             }
02335       }
02336       if (bSlot == NO_SLOT)
02337       {
02338             return( FALSE );
02339       }
02340     DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"findbetterspotforitem: swapping items");
02341       RearrangePocket(pSoldier, HANDPOS, bSlot, FOREVER );        
02342       return( TRUE );
02343 }
02344 
02345 UINT8 GetTraversalQuoteActionID( INT8 bDirection )
02346 {
02347       switch( bDirection )
02348       {
02349             case NORTHEAST: // east
02350                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_EAST );
02351 
02352             case SOUTHEAST: // south
02353                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_SOUTH );
02354 
02355             case SOUTHWEST: // west
02356                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_WEST );
02357 
02358             case NORTHWEST: // north
02359                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_NORTH );
02360 
02361             default:
02362                   return( 0 );
02363       }
02364 }
02365 
02366 UINT8 SoldierDifficultyLevel( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02367 {
02368       INT8 bDifficultyBase;
02369       INT8 bDifficulty;
02370 
02371       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2AI,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SoldierDifficultyLevel"));
02372       // difficulty modifier ranges from 0 to 100
02373       // and we want to end up with a number between 0 and 4 (4=hardest)
02374       // to a base of 1, divide by 34 to get a range from 1 to 3
02375       bDifficultyBase = 1 + ( CalcDifficultyModifier( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass ) / 34 );
02376 
02377       switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
02378       {
02379             case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
02380                   bDifficulty = bDifficultyBase - 1;
02381                   break;
02382 
02383             case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
02384                   bDifficulty = bDifficultyBase;
02385                   break;
02386 
02387             case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
02388                   bDifficulty = bDifficultyBase + 1;
02389                   break;
02390 
02391             // hard code militia;
02392             case SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA:
02393                   bDifficulty = 2;
02394                   break;
02395 
02396             case SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA:
02397                   bDifficulty = 3;
02398                   break;
02399 
02400             case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA:
02401                   bDifficulty = 4;
02402                   break;
02403 
02404             default:
02405                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM)
02406                   {                 
02407                         bDifficulty = bDifficultyBase + pSoldier->bLevel / 4;
02408                   }
02409                   else // civ...
02410                   {
02411                         bDifficulty = (bDifficultyBase + pSoldier->bLevel / 4) - 1;
02412                   }
02413                   break;
02414 
02415       }
02416 
02417       bDifficulty = __max( bDifficulty, 0 );
02418       bDifficulty = __min( bDifficulty, 4 );
02419 
02420       return( (UINT8) bDifficulty );
02421 }
02422 
02423 BOOLEAN ValidCreatureTurn( SOLDIERTYPE * pCreature, INT8 bNewDirection )
02424 {
02425       INT8  bDirChange;
02426       INT8  bTempDir;
02427       INT8  bLoop;
02428       BOOLEAN     fFound;
02429 
02430       bDirChange = (INT8) QuickestDirection( pCreature->bDirection, bNewDirection );
02431 
02432       for( bLoop = 0; bLoop < 2; bLoop++ )
02433       {
02434             fFound = TRUE;
02435             
02436             bTempDir = pCreature->bDirection;
02437 
02438             do
02439             {
02440 
02441                   bTempDir += bDirChange;
02442                   if (bTempDir < NORTH)
02443                   {
02444                         bTempDir = NORTHWEST;
02445                   }
02446                   else if (bTempDir > NORTHWEST)
02447                   {
02448                         bTempDir = NORTH;
02449                   }
02450                   if (!InternalIsValidStance( pCreature, bTempDir, ANIM_STAND ))
02451                   {
02452                         fFound = FALSE;
02453                         break;
02454                   }
02455 
02456             } while ( bTempDir != bNewDirection );
02457 
02458             if ( fFound )
02459             {
02460                   break;
02461             }
02462             else if ( bLoop > 0 )
02463             {
02464                   // can't find a dir!
02465                   return( FALSE );
02466             }
02467             else
02468             {
02469                   // try the other direction
02470                   bDirChange = bDirChange * -1;
02471             }
02472       }
02473 
02474       return( TRUE );
02475 }
02476 
02477 INT32 RangeChangeDesire( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02478 {
02479       INT32 iRangeFactorMultiplier;
02480 
02481       iRangeFactorMultiplier = pSoldier->bAIMorale - 1;
02482       switch (pSoldier->bAttitude)
02483       {
02484             case DEFENSIVE:         iRangeFactorMultiplier += -1; break;
02485             case BRAVESOLO:         iRangeFactorMultiplier +=  2; break;
02486             case BRAVEAID:          iRangeFactorMultiplier +=  2; break;
02487             case CUNNINGSOLO: iRangeFactorMultiplier +=  0; break;
02488             case CUNNINGAID:  iRangeFactorMultiplier +=  0; break;
02489             case ATTACKSLAYONLY:
02490             case AGGRESSIVE:  iRangeFactorMultiplier +=  1; break;
02491       }
02492       if ( gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsWeHaventSeenButEnemyDoes > 0 )
02493       {
02494             iRangeFactorMultiplier += gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsWeHaventSeenButEnemyDoes;
02495       }
02496       return( iRangeFactorMultiplier );
02497 }
02498 
02499 BOOLEAN ArmySeesOpponents( void )
02500 {
02501       INT32                   cnt;
02502       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
02503 
02504       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ )
02505       {
02506             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
02507 
02508             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
02509             {
02510                   return( TRUE );
02511             }
02512       }
02513 
02514       return( FALSE );
02515 }
